entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
